title: Edwardard
author: Edwardard
created_time: January 03, 2023, 04:47:46 AMLast edit: January 11, 2023, 01:09:20 AM by Edwardard
content: Coinballer Review CampaignWebsite | ANN ThreadAbout this campaign:- Coinballer is looking for a few users who can post a quality review in their ANN Thread- Reputable and high ranked users will be preferred.Payment rates:Payrates: 0.0025 BTC per person/review.How to Apply:Apply in the given form:Code:Forum Username:Rank:  BTC segwit address: Rules and other info:1] Only one review per user allowed (no multiple accounts).2] Only Sr. members and above should apply.3] After getting selected, you will get 1week to post a meaningful review in the Coinballer ANN Thread4] 0.0025 BTC will be sent to your wallet before your review (once you've been selected by me).5] Coinballer and I reserve the rights to end this campaign at any given time.6] I confirm that I myself hold the funds for this campaign.7] From The Owner: "Just an added requirement, the site is not available to customers in Australia. I've added blocking based on IP". Australian residents should not apply.
